__e: And soon where there used to be my granddaughter breathing and my son laughing, there will be... nothing.
Well, now I know that somebody out there...
It was nice to hear a woman's laugh in the house again.
He said he liked your laugh and your hair, and... I can't remember, I grew up in the '60s.
Sir, the day we've had, we could use a good chuckle like that.
We all thought someone was playing a joke... so we all had a good laugh and they put me on it.
